claim: during the 2004 san diego charger season , they play the oakland raider 1 week before the kansa city chief
during the 2004 san diego charger season , they play the cleveland brown 1 week after the tampa bay buccaneer

4. Check the next game after the Tampa Bay Buccaneer game: Now that we have found the Tampa Bay Buccaneer game, look at the following game (week 16) to see if it is the Cleveland Browns. In this case, the opponent for week 16 was indeed the Kansas City Chiefs, and the next game (week 17) has the Cleveland Browns as the opponent.

5. Compare the dates: To confirm that the Cleveland Browns game occurred one week after the Tampa Bay Buccaneers game, compare the dates in both games. The dates of the Tampa Bay Buccaneer and Cleveland Browns games were December 19 and January 2 respectively. Since there is only one week between these two dates (weeks 16 and 17), it satisfies the claim that the Cleveland Browns played one week after the Tampa Bay Buccaneers.
